{{title|operator&lt;&lt;,&gt;&gt;{{small|(std::experimental::filesystem::path)}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=fs_ts|1=
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; os, const path&amp; p );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=fs_ts|1=
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_istream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&gt;&gt;( std::basic_istream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; is, path&amp; p );
}}
{{dcl end}}

对路径 {{c|p}} 实施流输入或输出。使用 {{c|std::quoted}} 以使空格不会造成之后的流输入运算符读取发生截断。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|os|要实施输出的流}}
{{par|is|要实施输入的流}}
{{par|p|要插入或提取的路径}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
@1@ {{c|os}}
@2@ {{c|is}}

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===可能的实现===
{{eq fun
|1=
template&lt;class CharT, class Traits&gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;(std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; os, const path&amp; p)
{
    os &lt;&lt; std::quoted(p.string&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;());
    return os;
}
|2=
template&lt;class CharT, class Traits&gt;
std::basic_istream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&gt;&gt;(std::basic_istream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; is, path&amp; p)
{
    std::basic_string&lt;CharT, Traits&gt; t;
    is &gt;&gt; std::quoted(t);
    p = t;
    return is;
}
}}
